item.description:
2011 SSDOMG Annual Members will be dining @ Blue Pointe Bistro in Weymouth Landing for our 2nd and final 2011 Annual Members Only Event. Annual Members voted for this restaurant and this night in a Survey that took in August.  Blue Pointe Bistro tied for 1st place in the voting and Wednesday nights were the top vote-getter for availability in the voting. 

 

Blue Pointe Bistro serves Contemporary American Cuisine. Appetizers include salads, crispy calamari and salmon risotti, and range in price from $6-$10. Entrees include grilled chicken breasts, spring lamb pasta, and grilled hanger steak, and range in price from $15-$20.

 

We dined here in May 2008.  To read the reviews please click on the following link.  http://www.meetup.com/ssdomg/events/7770607/

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 

Annual Members Wednesday Night Dinner

Wednesday, November 16th @ 7pm

Blue Pointe Bistro

61 Washington Street

Route 53 (On the Corner of Front Street across from Sacred Heart Church) in "Weymouth Landing"

Weymouth, MA

781-335-7505

www.bluepointebistro.com

 

Event Organizer: Jeanne

Min/Max: 4 Annual Members 48 hours in advance (7pm on Monday, November 14th).  Maximum of 10 attendees.

Guests: None. This is a 2011 Annual Members Only event.

Event Fees: None.  This event is for 2011 Annual Members Only. Current Annual Members may also renew for 2012 this evening at a reduced rate (see below).

2012 Annual Membership Special: Join as an Annual Member for 2012 before the end of 2011 and save! Through the end of this year, 2012 Annual Memberships are $6.00 for Current and Past Annual Members and $8.00 for all other Group Members.

Cash Only Policy: Please bring cash! Paying for all of our meals in cash has been SSDOMG'S policy for over five years. It allows us to avoid the confusion of having the waitstaff run multiple credit card slips and generally helps to keep things simpler for everyone.

RSVP Deadline: Tuesday, November 15th @ 8pm. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by the Event Organizer. Changes to "No" after the deadline will be considered No-Shows per our guidelines on the About Us Pages.

Inclement Weather: Event takes place rain or shine

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 

Directions: Can be found on the website at www.bluepointebistro.com.

Overview: Blue Pointe Bistro is located on Route 53 in Weymouth Landing on the corner of Washington and Front Streets across from Sacred Heart Church.

Public Transportation:

Commuter Rail: 1/4 mile south of the East Braintree/Weymouth Landing Commuter Rail Station

T Bus: On the Bus Line
item.how_to_find_us: We will be meeting in the Lobby and then we will go to our table together. If you arrive after we are seated please ask the host to show you to our table. The reservation is under "Jeanne and "SSDOMG."

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Annual Members Wednesday Night Dinner
